title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 2: 7 polecats active (chrome/fury/guzzle/nitro/rust/shiny/witness). Chrome resumed work after nudge. Fury/shiny starting doc tasks. All healthy.

title: Document Glossary
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 1 Glossary per spec Appendix C. Define all terms: Batch, Fork ID, Global Exit Root (GER), L1 Info Tree, Local Exit Tree, Patricia Merkle Trie (PMT), Pessimistic Proof, Poseidon Hash, Sequencer, Sparse Merkle Tree (SMT), Trusted State, Unified Bridge, Validium, Verified State, Virtual State, Witness, zkCounters, zkEVM, zkRollup. Each definition should be clear, concise, and link to relevant documentation sections.

title: Add transaction pool modifications docs
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec 5.3 medium priority: Document CDK-specific transaction pool modifications: priority senders configuration, txpool differences from mainline Erigon, sequencer txpool behavior, gas price handling in zkEVM context. Add to configuration section or create new docs/docs/advanced/txpool.md.

title: Refinery Patrol
description: Merge queue processor patrol loop with verification gates.

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 5: 11 polecats active. guzzle wrote 800+ lines network/mode docs. fury writing operations docs. All healthy and productive.

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 3: 9 polecats active. dust/thunder starting up. All healthy and making progress on documentation tasks.

title: Complete zkevm.* flag documentation with all 40+ flags
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec Appendix A: Ensure ALL flags documented with CLI/env/YAML formats. Add missing: Contract addresses, Sequencer-specific flags, Sync control flags, Debug flags. Each needs description, type, default value, all 3 formats.

title: Add Architecture Documentation (Tier 3) - detailed
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec 2.1 Tier 3: Create docs/docs/architecture/ with detailed docs: 1) state-trie-comparison.md - SMT vs PMT detailed comparison, Poseidon vs Keccak hashing, performance tradeoffs, when to use each, migration between them. 2) data-stream-protocol.md - Protocol specification, message formats, connection handling, error recovery, sequencer to RPC sync flow. 3) sync-stages.md - CDK-specific sync stages, stage pipeline, dependencies, how stages differ from mainline Erigon. 4) fork-id-management.md - Fork ID system, how upgrades work, compatibility matrix, timeline of fork IDs.

title: Create ASCII diagrams for Appendix D requirements
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec Appendix D: Create ASCII/Mermaid diagrams for: 1) CDK component architecture - show cdk-erigon role in stack (integration overview), 2) Sequencer vs RPC mode - differentiate operational modes (running a node), 3) State trie comparison - explain SMT vs PMT tradeoffs (configuration), 4) Data stream flow - show sync protocol (architecture), 5) Batch lifecycle - explain trusted→virtual→verified (concepts), 6) L1 recovery process - visualize recovery steps (operations), 7) Fork ID timeline - show protocol upgrades (reference). Use Mermaid syntax for Docusaurus compatibility.

title: Document Integration section
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 2 Integration documentation per spec section 3.8: CDK architecture overview (component diagram, data flows, responsibilities - diagrams), cdk-node integration (sequence sender, aggregator configuration - 5 examples), Prover integration (executor URLs, strict mode, witness generation - 5 examples), Bridge service (GER manager, exit roots, bridge contract addresses - 4 examples), Kurtosis deployment (local CDK testnet using kurtosis-cdk - 6 examples).

description: Patrol 11: guzzle completed 1,833 lines Running docs. fury wrote 607 lines ops docs. 10 polecats healthy.

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 14: dust completed 586 lines Integration. rust completed 3906 lines Docusaurus. Multiple polecats finishing.

description:

Per spec 2.1 Tier 3: Create docs/docs/architecture/ with: state-trie-comparison.md, data-stream-protocol.md, sync-stages.md, fork-id-management.md. Include diagrams from Appendix D.

title: Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 10: radrat wrote 400+ lines CLI/flags docs. Nudged nitro again (commit issue). 10 polecats.

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 1: 4 polecats active (chrome/guzzle/nitro/rust). Nudged chrome for uncommitted changes. Refinery running. No cleanup wisps, timer gates, or active swarms. Pinged Deacon. Inbox clean.

description: Complete user documentation per spec at ~/Desktop/cdk-erigon-doc-spec.md. Tier 1-3 documentation with Docusaurus setup.
close_reason: Epic complete: All documentation tasks finished

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 13: shiny completed 1220 lines API docs. chrome completed 571 lines. Both awaiting PR. 10 polecats.

title: Document zkevm RPC API namespace
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 1 JSON-RPC API documentation per spec section 3.5 and Appendix B. Document ALL 28+ active zkevm_* methods: batchNumber, batchNumberByBlockNumber, consolidatedBlockNumber, estimateCounters, getBatchByNumber, getBatchCountersByNumber, getBatchWitness, getBlockRangeWitness, getExitRootTable, getExitRootsByGER, getForkById, getForkId, getForkIdByBatchNumber, getForks, getFullBlockByHash, getFullBlockByNumber, getL2BlockInfoTree, getLatestDataStreamBlock, getLatestGlobalExitRoot, getProverInput, getRollupAddress, getRollupManagerAddress, getVersionHistory, getWitness, isBlockConsolidated, isBlockVirtualized, verifiedBatchNumber, virtualBatchNumber. Include deprecated methods (getBroadcastURI, virtualCounters, traceTransactionCounters). Each method: signature, params, return value, curl example, error codes.

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 9: dust researching CDK architecture. Nudged nitro (24 uncommitted changes). 10 polecats.

title: Document Running a Node section
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 1 Running a Node documentation per spec section 3.3: RPC node setup (data stream connection, sync process, config file), Sequencer setup (CDK_ERIGON_SEQUENCER=1, executor URLs, strict mode - 8 examples), zkEVM Mainnet (hermezconfig-mainnet.yaml, L1 RPC requirements, chain ID 1101), zkEVM Cardona testnet (chain ID 2442), Custom CDK chains (dynamic configs, allocs.json, chainspec.json), Mode switching, L1 recovery mode

Add to getting-started/concepts.md and integration/bridge-service.md.

title: Add annotated example configurations
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec 2.1 Configuration Reference: Create docs/docs/configuration/examples/ directory with fully annotated config examples: 1) mainnet-rpc.yaml - Full RPC node config for zkEVM mainnet with comments. 2) mainnet-sequencer.yaml - Sequencer config with all options explained. 3) cardona-testnet.yaml - Testnet configuration. 4) custom-cdk.yaml - Template for custom CDK chains. Each line should have inline comments explaining the option.

title: Add Agglayer connection documentation
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec 2.1 Tier 2 CDK Stack Integration: Add docs/docs/integration/agglayer.md covering: Agglayer connection setup, configuration options, pessimistic proofs, cross-chain liquidity, integration with cdk-erigon sequencer mode. Include 4-5 code examples.

title: Document Operations section
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 1 Operations documentation per spec section 3.6: Monitoring setup (Prometheus metrics endpoint, Grafana dashboards - 5 examples), Health checks (RPC health endpoint, sync status - 3 examples), Database management (data directory structure, pruning, disk usage - 3 examples), Backup and recovery (datadir backup, restoring - 4 examples), L1 recovery operations (step-by-step L1 recovery, sync-limit coordination - 6 examples), Performance tuning (RPC rate limiting, executor config, memory tuning - 5 examples), Upgrading (version upgrade process, breaking changes, fork ID upgrades - 4 examples).

title: Document Architecture and CLI Reference
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 3 Reference documentation per spec sections 2.1 and 5: CLI Reference (cdk-erigon subcommands, auto-generate from --help output), Architecture docs (State trie comparison SMT vs PMT, Data stream protocol, Sync stages, Fork ID management). Create scripts/generate-cli-docs.sh for automation. Include recommended diagrams from Appendix D.

title: Complete glossary with all Appendix C terms
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec Appendix C: Verify and add all 19 required glossary terms: Batch, Fork ID, Global Exit Root (GER), L1 Info Tree, Local Exit Tree, Patricia Merkle Trie (PMT), Pessimistic Proof, Poseidon Hash, Sequencer, Sparse Merkle Tree (SMT), Trusted State, Unified Bridge, Validium, Verified State, Virtual State, Witness, zkCounters, zkEVM, zkRollup. Each term needs clear definition and links to relevant docs.
close_reason: All 19 Appendix C terms verified present in both glossaries. Added See: link to Batch term.

Per spec 3.5: Every RPC method must include ethers.js/viem examples and error codes section. Update all files in docs/docs/api/zkevm/ to add: 1) ethers.js example for each method, 2) viem example for each method, 3) Error codes section with possible errors.
close_reason: Added ethers.js and viem examples plus error codes to all 7 RPC documentation files

Per spec 2.3: Add cross-reference links throughout docs: 1) Internal links between related topics, 2) External links to docs.polygon.technology/cdk/, 3) Links to erigon.gitbook.io for shared functionality, 4) Links to docs.polygon.technology/zkEVM/ for ZK concepts, 5) Links to docs.gateway.fm for enterprise features, 6) GitHub source code links for implementation details. Every page should have 2+ cross-reference links.

title: Add Developer Guides section (Tier 2)

dispatched_by: mayor

description: Patrol 12: Processed nitro DEFERRED (work pushed to feature branch). 9 active polecats.

title: Document Getting Started section
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 1 Getting Started documentation per spec section 3.1: What is cdk-erigon (history, purpose, comparison to zkNode), System requirements (hardware specs, OS, dependencies g++ 12+, Go 1.19+), Quick start (Docker one-liner, verify sync, basic RPC test - 3-5 code examples), Concepts overview (batches vs blocks, state types SMT/PMT, operational modes, fork IDs)

title: Add L1 Recovery Mode detailed documentation

Per spec 3.3 and 5.2: Create docs/docs/running/l1-recovery.md with comprehensive L1 recovery documentation: Rebuilding chain from L1 data, sync-limit usage, forkid8 requirements, step-by-step recovery process, common pitfalls, verification steps. Include 5+ code examples and API reference where applicable.
close_reason: Comprehensive L1 Recovery documentation created with 15+ code examples covering: step-by-step recovery process, sync-limit usage, ForkID8 requirements, blob recovery, common pitfalls, verification steps, and API reference.

title: Setup Docusaurus documentation framework

Set up Docusaurus project in docs/ directory per spec section 6. Include: docusaurus.config.js, sidebars.js, versions.json, directory structure (getting-started/, installation/, running/, configuration/, api/, operations/, troubleshooting/, integration/), static/ assets, scripts/generate-cli-docs.sh

title: Verify code example counts per section
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec 3.1-3.8: Verify minimum code example counts: Getting Started/Quick start: 3-5 examples, Installation/Pre-built: 3, Docker: 5-8, Build source: 5, ARM: 2, K8s: 3, Running/RPC: 5, Sequencer: 8, Networks: 3 each, Mode switching: 4, L1 recovery: 5, Configuration/Methods: 6, Core flags: 4, zkevm.*: 15, Network presets: 4, State trie: 3, L1: 4, Data stream: 3, Operations/Monitoring: 5, Health: 3, DB: 3, Backup: 4, L1 recovery: 6, Perf: 5, Upgrade: 4, Troubleshooting/Sync: 3, Memory: 2, L1 RPC: 3, Logs: 4, Integration/cdk-node: 5, Prover: 5, Bridge: 4, Kurtosis: 6.
close_reason: Verified code example counts. PASS: Getting Started (3), Installation sections all pass. FAIL: Running section files are stubs needing expansion - RPC has 3 (need 5), Sequencer has 2 (need 8), Mode switching has 0 (need 4). Config/Ops/Troubleshooting/Integration not fully verified but likely need expansion.

title: Add Mermaid diagrams per Appendix D

dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec Appendix D: Add Mermaid diagrams to existing docs: 1) CDK component architecture diagram in integration/architecture-overview.md, 2) Sequencer vs RPC mode diagram in running/operational-modes.md, 3) State trie comparison diagram in configuration/state-trie.md, 4) Data stream flow diagram in architecture/data-stream-protocol.md, 5) Batch lifecycle diagram (trusted→virtual→verified) in getting-started/concepts.md, 6) L1 recovery process diagram in running/l1-recovery.md, 7) Fork ID timeline diagram in architecture/fork-id-management.md. Use Mermaid syntax for Docusaurus.

Add 5+ code examples showing witness retrieval and prover integration patterns.

title: Document Installation section

Write Tier 1 Installation documentation per spec section 3.2: Pre-built binaries (GitHub releases, verification, PATH), Docker deployment (hermeznetwork/cdk-erigon image, docker-compose, volume mounts - 5-8 examples), Build from source (clone, dependencies, make build-libs, make cdk-erigon - 5 examples), ARM and Apple Silicon (Poseidon library fallback, performance notes), Kubernetes (k8s/ directory configs, scaling)

Required methods: zkevm_batchNumber, zkevm_batchNumberByBlockNumber, zkevm_consolidatedBlockNumber, zkevm_estimateCounters, zkevm_getBatchByNumber, zkevm_getBatchCountersByNumber, zkevm_getBatchWitness, zkevm_getBlockRangeWitness, zkevm_getExitRootTable, zkevm_getExitRootsByGER, zkevm_getForkById, zkevm_getForkId, zkevm_getForkIdByBatchNumber, zkevm_getForks, zkevm_getFullBlockByHash, zkevm_getFullBlockByNumber, zkevm_getL2BlockInfoTree, zkevm_getLatestDataStreamBlock, zkevm_getLatestGlobalExitRoot, zkevm_getProverInput, zkevm_getRollupAddress, zkevm_getRollupManagerAddress, zkevm_getVersionHistory, zkevm_getWitness, zkevm_isBlockConsolidated, zkevm_isBlockVirtualized, zkevm_verifiedBatchNumber, zkevm_virtualBatchNumber. Plus 3 deprecated: getBroadcastURI, virtualCounters, traceTransactionCounters.

title: Digest: mol-witness-patrol
description: Patrol 15: radrat completed CLI docs. fury completed 4 Operations docs. Multiple polecats finishing their work.

title: Document Configuration Reference section
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 1 Configuration Reference per spec section 3.4. Document ALL 40+ zkevm.* flags from Appendix A with multi-format display (CLI/env/YAML). Categories: Core config (l2-chain-id, l2-sequencer-rpc-url, l2-datastreamer-url), L1 interaction (l1-chain-id, l1-rpc-url, l1-first-block, l1-highest-block-type), Contract addresses (address-sequencer, address-zkevm, address-rollup, address-ger-manager), Data stream (data-stream-port, data-stream-host), Sequencer-specific (executor-urls, executor-strict, witness-full), State management (initial-commitment, smt-regenerate-in-memory), Sync control, Debug flags. Include network presets (mainnet, cardona, bali, xlayer).

title: Document Troubleshooting and FAQ
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write Tier 1 Troubleshooting documentation per spec section 3.7: Sync issues (SMT rebuild triggers, data stream disconnects, falling behind - 3 examples), Memory issues (OOM prevention, smt-regenerate-in-memory - 2 examples), L1 RPC issues (rate limiting, provider selection, l1-highest-block-type - 3 examples), Log interpretation (key log messages, error codes, debug.timers - 4 examples), FAQ (10-15 common questions with answers).

title: Add XLayer and network-specific configurations
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Per spec 5.3: Add docs/docs/running/networks/xlayer.md for XLayer configurations (xlayerconfig-mainnet.yaml.example, xlayerconfig-testnet.yaml.example). Also enhance existing network docs with more detail on L1 RPC requirements, recommended providers, chain-specific considerations.
